SINT_Prompt_Task.Objective: Develop an ethical framework for advanced AI development considering technical, social, and economic implications. Use the Generator + Critic (N=2) methodology with comprehensive feedback loops and detailed analysis.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Context: AI development involves significant ethical considerations including bias, privacy, autonomy, transparency, and societal impact. Key stakeholders include developers, users, affected communities, and regulatory bodies.

Consultant.Name: AI Ethics Specialist
Consultant.Focus: Algorithmic fairness, bias mitigation, privacy protection, transparency requirements

Consultant.Name: Technology Philosopher
Consultant.Focus: Autonomy, human dignity, moral status of AI systems, long-term implications of superintelligence

SINT_Prompt_Task.Methodology: Generator + Critic (N=2) with comprehensive feedback loops and detailed analysis
SINT_Prompt_Task.Finalization_Protocol: All expert positions must include detailed arguments with concrete examples, data points, and comprehensive analysis. The process must include comprehensive feedback loops with detailed evaluation between the two experts. Output must include detailed analysis from both perspectives.
